text: "agamathi ha amathi mandalayata erehi pethsama janawariyata kal yayi"

allas ho dushana wimarshana komishan sabhawa me bawa danumdenu labuwe thiru badu rahitha wahana balapathra alewi kota ayuthu labha laba athi manthriwaru pirisakata erehiwa thama wisin karana lada paminilla wimarshanaya kirimata allas ho dushana wimarshana komishan sabhawata niyogayak karana lesa illa nithignya nagananda kodithuwakku mahatha wisin gonukara thibu pethsama kandawu awasthawediya.

eeth, kayiwaruwedi hari bukiyedi hari yunikorng parisara hithakamiyek wemin inna gaman, aththa jiwithedi aanduwath ekka eriyas kawar karaganna hari, lesiyata pahasuwata kammali kamata hari parana pillatama paninawata wada, wadathma sudusu de yunikong atitiyungs aththa jiwithetath implimant karaganna eka.

mig guwan yana miladi ganima sambandhayen rahasigatha kumak ho siduwi athi bawa janathawata eeththuganwimata aanduwe athamun genayana pracharaya thamage nama kelasimata digu kalayak mululle pawathina prayathnayaka kotasak bawa hitapu aarakshaka lekam gotabhaya rajapaksha mahatha pawasayi.

me sambandhayen hiru prawruththi anshaya kala wimasimakadi parisara sanrakshana bharaye adhyaksha parisarawedi sajiwa chamikara kiya sitiye nithiya kriyathmaka kala pamanin jala mulashra menma parisarayada aaraksha karagatha nohaki bawayi.palath palana aayathanawala jalamulasha aaraksha kara ganime wagakima ee ee aayathana sathu bawa madhyama parisara adhikariya pawasanawa.
kawara kramayak, obe palati ekathu poshanaya itha prayojanawath wanu atha.
ape ayiyala wasayi kiyala..."

me amma gabini bawa dana gaththata passe langama thiyena pawul saukhyaya sayaneta yanna athi , ethanadi pawul saukhya niladhariniya saha pawul saukhya heda soyuriya mawa pilibanda thorathuru wimasim , daththa ras kirim mangin handunaganna athi aැya “awadanam thaththwaye athi mawak“ bawata .

dashaka thunakata adhika kalayak el.ti.ti.ee.ye prana apakaruwan lesa jiwath wu uthura - nagenahira janathawa ada prajathanthrawadi rataka saba nidahasa bhukthi windimin sitithi. 2008 wasare marthu 10 wanida pawathi madakalapuwa maha nagara sabha mathiwaranayath samanga el.ti.ti.ee.ya thuwakku handin nihanda kala janathawage prajathanthrawadi ayithin yali uthurata labemin pawathi. 2008 wasare mayi 10 wanida madakalapuwa, thrikunamalaya ha ampara yana disthrikkawalin sadumlath nagenahira palath sabha chandaya pawathwuye awurudu 19 kata pasuwaya.

palath palana aayathana sima nirnaya abhiyachana warthawata erehi pethsam illa askara ganimath samanga diwayina pura pawathina siyaluma palath palana aayathana siyallehima mathiwaranaya ekama dinayakadi pawathwimata mathiwarana komisame awadhanaya yomu wi thibenawa.

amma wage kiyala thamayi godak aya kiwwe..thaththage thibuna konde karali gathiya mata thibunata malayata na...malaya bohoma pahapath podi kale matath wada..eda eeka hitiya widiya dakinakota dukath hithenawa ban....ada oya wayasata lamayi inna oone porak sira kiyanne...munu pothe kathawa mama dakka...daru surathal balanna mamath aasayi ban...
